data.text:
@MarkHubbard33 @chrishipkins @nzherald I agree, it's common sense to allow natural immunity to propagate.

However there are vested interests in the rollout now.  Back handers, bribes and contracts will be the undoing of us all.

@MarkHubbard33 @chrishipkins @nzherald the hysteria continues in Aussie, where the new mutant variant is being claimed to be 30% more infectious! it's all bollocks, the virus can only mutate to be less virulent. Unless anti-vaccine mutants appear...but vaccine isn't a real virus, only a piece
@MarkHubbard33 @mrrobxtraconz @chrishipkins @nzherald Yes, a few weeks ago Bill Gates said Omicron has achieved more protection than all the vaccination efforts combined

@MarkHubbard33 @chrishipkins @nzherald I don't think anyone's listening. 

How have we sunk this low?
